message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your company.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you consider $9,500?  I think this price reflects the value we both see in this product.

Hi Bob, I understand your concern about the price, but I have to consider my own costs and profit margins. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $10,500. I think this is a fair compromise that still reflects the value of the product to your business.
